comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool/conduct an update of site conditions and supplementary Phase II/III Environmental Site Assessments at the following four locations: - Chenal Ecarte Range (DFRP# 10793), Walpole Island, Ontario; - Light 92 Light Station (LL 259.0), Mariatown, Ontario; - Sherman?s Point Light Station (LL450.0), Lennox & Addington County, Ontario; and, - Whiskey Island (DFRP# 11112), Georgian Bay, Ontario.
